articles.author: Jessica Hamzelou
articles.title: Coronavirus: What are the worst symptoms and how deadly is covid-19?
articles.description: We are starting to understand how the covid-19 virus may affect people in different ways, depending on their age and underlying health conditions
articles.content:
By Jessica Hamzelou
Use a tissue to blow your nose, and put it in the bin
Yui Mok/PA Wire/PA Images
It has been two months since Chinas health officials described a mysterious virus spreading in Hubei. As of 2 March, the new coronavirus has infected nearly… [+4679 chars]

articles.author: Debora MacKenzie
articles.title: Coronavirus may have been circulating undetected in the US for 6 weeks
articles.description: A shared mutation in the covid-19 virus from two infected people who had no contact suggests the coronavirus has been quietly spreading in the US for weeks
